title: SOLD: 1885 Currier and Ives - “The Champions of the Ball Racket"
author: Bugsy

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1885 Currier and Ives - “The Champions of the Ball Racket"
posts.post_content:
This is an original Currier and Ives print from 1885 from the Dark Town series.  This print is entitled, "The Champions of the Ball Racket at the Close of the Season."  Originals are extremely scarce.  It has been professional framed and is protected by UV blocking glass.  Framed, the pieces measures a large 16" x 20"  It originally came from a Lew Lipsett auction.

[url]http://www.oldjudge.com/?showpage=/archive/200811/pins-display/224/&i=224&p=2[/url]

Sold.

Thanks.

Chris
[url]staindsox@hotmail.com[/url]
Really nice print! If only I had the $$$!
